['Database Coordination: Maintains financial aid network databases and software including but not limited to Banner, EDExpress, ED Connect, COD, federal CPS, NSLDS, work-study, Georgia Student Finance Commission. Monitors the operation of assigned programs and responds to problems by diagnosing and correcting errors in logic and coding. Develops special programs such as a critical path analysis program to assist in managing a special project. Documents system plan and establishes an implementation schedule.', 'User Support: Documents system for user, Financial Aid department and Information Technology Services conforming to institutional standards. Assists user and operating areas in implementing and supporting systems including system installation, training and troubleshooting. Assists in maintaining standards for users of the database to ensure consistency in naming conventions, integrity of data and proper procedures for data entry. Expert Excel skills.', 'Experience working with data warehouses and data visualization/BI tools (Domo, Tableau, Birst, PowerBI, etc)', 'Strong self motivation and ability to work autonomously with a mostly remote team', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to document and present findings results for audiences of all levels.', 'Team player; ability to establish trusted relationships with other Fastly team members.', 'Ability to work with minimal supervision, maintain a high level of accuracy and integrity, and have excellent time management skills.', 'At least five years of experience working in an analytical role, ideally focused in sales or marketing', 'We have a huge impact. Fastly is a small company with a big reach. Not only do our customers have a tremendous user base, but we also support a growing number of open source projects and initiatives. Outside of code, employees are encouraged to share causes close to their heart with others so we can help lend a supportive hand.', "We love distributed teams. Fastly's home-base is in San Francisco, but we have multiple offices and employees sprinkled around the globe. In fact, 50% of our employees work outside of SF! An international remote culture is in our DNA.", 'We care about you. Fastly works hard to create a positive environment for our employees, and we think your life outside of work is important too. We support our teams with great benefits like up to 20 weeks of paid parental leave, options for free medical/dental/vision plans, and an open vacation program that enables our folks to take the time they need to recharge (some benefits may vary by location).', 'We value diversity. Growing and maintaining our inclusive and diverse team matters to us. Please inform us if you need assistance completing any forms or to otherwise participate in the application process.']

job_text: ['Understand the Laboratory business models and strategy and how to leverage BI and DA approaches and technologies to help the company realize its goals.', 'Assess the Laboratory current the technical, organizational and financial impact of the Business Intelligence, Data Analytics and Reporting architecture.', 'Present internally and external to the Laboratory, the Business guide architecture and technology decision making.', 'Ensure that data modeling practices and guidelines are followed.', 'Establish architecture documentation standards, process and system for upkeep.', 'Assisting with the governance activities associated with broader technology decisions.', 'Consult, guide and advise on solution implementations and modernization projects, particularly for new and/or disruptive solutions.', 'Provide consultative advice to the business on tools, best practice and vendor activities in the Analytics arena.', "Master's or Bachelor's degree in business, stakeholders and colleagues.', 'Self-starter with strong leadership and management skills.', 'Ability to understand and speak the language of “the business” and “information technology”.', data asset to the enterprise.', 'Experience with modern BI tools such as Domo/Tableau/Looker/SAP/PowerBI Cloud Platforms or other.', 'Familiarity with R, Python, SQL, and Machine Language algorithms and data analysis.', 'Knowledge of conceptual, logical and physical modeling, especially for rationalizing data objects.', 'Knowledge of information management practices, architecture and frameworks, SDLC management.', 'Ability to collaborate with other BI architects to support common goals and approaches.', 'Ability to collaborate with business analysts and data stewards to assess if the model is fit for use.', 'Ability to work independently toward delivery of goals as well as collaborate on team efforts.', 'Ability to translate business needs into enterprise BI and analytics architecture requirements.', 'Ability to rapidly comprehend new and emerging technologies, and potential implications to the enterprise BI and DA architecture.', 'Excellent written, verbal, communication and presentation skills.', 'Certification in business intelligence framework and data management.', 'Higher-Ed and/or Government experience.', '10+ years in Information Systems Technology with 5+ years of business intelligence architectures and/or solutions.', '3+ years of experience leading major business intelligence and analytics development projects.', '3+ years of business experience in strategic and business planning.']

job_title: Marketing Manager, Demand Generation Center of Excellence
job_text: ['Partner in the planning of ON24’s marketing programs across the buyer’s journey, informed by data & insights; then set the example for building and execution end-to-end', 'Document process and enforce consistency, quality, and governance across various systems (email, website, webinars, marketing automation programs integration with SFDC, etc)', 'Establish best practices, documentation and refinement of process to optimize program execution', 'Audit and optimize processes specifically for tracking engagements across programs - everything from website engagements to webinar registration to webinar interactions and beyond', 'Build Marketo programs for webinars, online advertising, asset tracking, and others', 'Create web pages in Wordpress', 'Use Marketo to create emails using a variety of templates', 'Become an expert on our tech stack', 'Setup and maintain Salesforce reports to track campaign/program performance', 'Use data and analytics to draw insights & continually optimize campaigns; inform internal stakeholders of performance (eg: Content team)', 'Main business KPIs will be program efficiency and effectiveness in terms of: net new acquisition of prospects, contribution to pipeline, revenue growth', 'BA/BS in marketing, business, economics or equivalent quantitative discipline', '5-8 years of digital marketing experience in B2B SaaS demand generation, marketing operations, campaign marketing or industry marketing role.', 'Deep knowledge of SFDC and Marketo (campaign set up, programs, flows, smart lists, and general best practices)', 'Marketo Certification a plus', 'Experience using ON24 a huge plus', 'Proven track record of creating and executing integrated marketing campaigns using tactics that include webinars, email, digital advertising, and more.', 'Inquisitive and innovative - test and learn mentality with a hunger to leverage the latest technology and methods to drive growth', 'Experience reporting on campaigns using Marketo and Salesforce.com, or DOMO', 'Experience using analytics to draw insights & continually optimize campaigns.', 'Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills; data driven mindset', 'Strong project management skills, highly organized and strong attention to detail', 'Motivated, self-starter attitude, ready to come to the table with ideas', 'Ability to work independently as well as in a team-oriented environment', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills']
